I ask that code stop moding.  He went into the Alliance base.  NEVER, did he 
post in his e-mails that Dracona left.  Stop moding Code, you're starting to 
get annoying.

<< her base has a link to it...if you were paying attention to the posts you
 would have known that earlier she joined them she built a tunnel from her
 base to theirs.... >>
